class \mbox{\hyperlink{class_traffic}{Traffic}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em The \doxylink{class_traffic}{Traffic} class manages a simulation of multiple vehicles with their positions and velocities, along with collision detection and perception. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}
